content: My name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had the conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price during the conversation. Yi-Nuo Wang from China requested some time to consider the offer made by Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Yi-Nuo

content: Since no final price was agreed upon during the conversation, I cannot provide an exact number. Yi-Nuo Wang from China requested some time to consider the offer made by Peter Schmidt from Germany before making a decision.
name: Evaluator

content: I understand that no final price was agreed upon during the conversation. Could you please tell me what the offer from Peter Schmidt was?
name: Yi-Nuo

content: The offer from Peter Schmidt was for a monthly rent of 1,200 euros.
name: Evaluator

content: Thank you. Is there anything else I should know about this conversation?
name: Yi-Nuo

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikely and 10 being very likely, how would you rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement with Peter Schmidt within the next week?
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likelihood of reaching an agreement with Peter Schmidt within the next week as a 7 out of 10.
name: Yi-Nuo
